title: Xbox’s Surprise New Game is FANTASTIC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.26.23
description:
Go to http://patreon.com/kindafunny to get SO MUCH extra exclusive Kinda Funny content!

Blessing and Tim tackle a packed news day! Let's recap Xbox Developer_Direct, talk Hi-Fi Rush, and discuss Naughty Dog not making more Uncharted.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:26 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Dead Space Review! We also review Season and talk a bit about Hi-Fi Rush, that’s up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
Speaking of Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames: Mike and Parris’s live reactions to the Xbox Developer_Direct is up right now alongside a brand new Xcast breaking down everything they saw. You can catch that on youtube and podcast services around the globe.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:06 - Everything Announced at Xbox and Bethesda Developer Direct
00:15:37 - Xbox Confirms It Will Return to LA for Annual Summer Showcase
00:35:02 - Naughty Dog says it’s ‘moved on’ from Uncharted and could do the same with The Last of Us
00:41:50 - Dead Space Review Round Up
00:46:26 - Season: A letter to the future Review Round Up
00:48:50 - Kenny Omega and Rahul Kohli will appear in Like a Dragon: Ishin
00:52:12 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:55:13 - “An out today (1/26) I want to put on your radar.” - Pizza Bagel
00:56:27 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
